title: District Profile: Nevada's 3rd Congressional
teaser: Republican Congressman Joe Heck of Nevada will face Democratic challenger Erin Bilbray in November.
contentencoded:
In our weekly look at congressional races across the country, we focus on Nevada’s 3rd congressional district, where Republican incumbent Joe Heck, who has been in office since 2011, is going to face Democrat Erin Bilbray.

Ian Mylchreest of KNPR joins Here & Now’s Jeremy Hobson with details on the approaching race.

  • See more District Profiles in our series

Do you have a suggestion for a district we should profile? Tell us in the comments.

Guest:

  • Ian Mylchreest, senior producer for KNPR’s “State of Nevada.”
